text: (enave) ninkal (etuttu valartta) avarkalai avarkalin tantaiya(rin peya)r kalaic colli (innarin pillaiyena) alaiyunkal - atuve allahvitam nitamullatakum; anal avarkalutaiya tantaiya(rin peya)rkalai ninkal ariyavillaiyayin, avarkal unkalukku canmarkka cakotararkalakavum, unkalutaiya nanparkalakavum irukkinranar; (munnar) itu parri ninkal tavaru ceytiruntal, unkal mitu kurramillai anal, unkalutaiya irutayankal ventumenre kurinal (unkal mitu kurramakum) allah mannippavanakavum, mikka kirupaiyutaiyavanakavum irukkinran
